channel.title: Margaret Riley on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Cumbernauld Action for Care of the Elderly: Covid-19 response
item.description: MD - Michelle Drumm MR - Margaret Riley Cumbernauld Action for Care of the Elderly, or CACE, is an organisation that supports improved wellbeing and quality of life for older people in Cumbernauld. We spoke to Margaret Riley, Chief Executive of CACE about how the organisation is managing in the Coronavirus outbreak. MD Margaret, could you just tell me, how did CACE…it stands for Cumbernauld Action for Care of the Elderly - how did that come about and what does it do?
